virtualpondgui

Class VirtualPond

  • java.lang.Object
    • virtualpondgui.VirtualPond
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, GUICore

    public class VirtualPond
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, GUICore
    Contains main() method. Is the primary class of the program.
    Author:
    atleebrink

      Deletes 0 or more contacts from the current address book.

      Returns an array of selected contact indices.
      java.net.URI getUserManualURI() 
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      A simple main method.
      void onExport()
      IF nothing selected, THEN ask the user if they want to export the entire address book, IF yes, then prompt for a destination file IF that file exists, prompt for overwrite ELSE write STRIPPED version (no custom fields) of address book to that file ELSE if one or more items are selected THEN ask the user if they want to export the selected contacts, IF yes, then prompt for a destination file IF that file exists, prompt for overwrite ELSE write STRIPPED version (no custom fields) of selected contacts to that file.
      void onFileNew()
      IF an untitled, empty address book is loaded, do nothing.
      void onFileOpen()
      Prompts user for file name FIRST, THEN IF it seems to be valid: IF an untitled, empty address book is loaded, reuse this window, ELSE start a new instance of the program and load it there.
      void onImport()
      Prompts user for file name, IF it seems to be valid: reads all contacts from that file, IF contacts contain custom fields, THEN tells the user that some information will be lost (specify which fields) AND asks the user for confirmation to proceed IF NO then cancels import FINALLY inserts all those contacts into the current address book.
      void openFile(java.io.File file)
      Attempts to open a file and make it the current address book for the current window.
      void prepareEmptyBook()
      If there is a loaded address book then unloads it.
      void quit()
      Tells the main program that the user wants to quit.
      void run()
      Implements Runnable.run() to create GUI components, and provides those components with a GUICore interface to this class.
      boolean saveFile()
      Attempts to save the current address book to the current file, or prompts the user if there is no current filename.
      void saveFileAs()
      Prompts the user for a new filename, and attempts to save there.
      void showUserManual()
      Shows the user manual.
      void updateContactAtIndex(int index, Contact contact)
      Overwrites a contact at an existing index with new values.

      • onExport

        public void onExport()
        Description copied from interface: GUICore
        IF nothing selected, THEN ask the user if they want to export the entire address book, IF yes, then prompt for a destination file IF that file exists, prompt for overwrite ELSE write STRIPPED version (no custom fields) of address book to that file ELSE if one or more items are selected THEN ask the user if they want to export the selected contacts, IF yes, then prompt for a destination file IF that file exists, prompt for overwrite ELSE write STRIPPED version (no custom fields) of selected contacts to that file.
        Specified by:
        onExport in interface GUICore

      • onImport

        public void onImport()
        Description copied from interface: GUICore
        Prompts user for file name, IF it seems to be valid: reads all contacts from that file, IF contacts contain custom fields, THEN tells the user that some information will be lost (specify which fields) AND asks the user for confirmation to proceed IF NO then cancels import FINALLY inserts all those contacts into the current address book.
        Specified by:
        onImport in interface GUICore

      • onFileNew

        public void onFileNew()
        Description copied from interface: GUICore
        IF an untitled, empty address book is loaded, do nothing. IF a non-empty address book is loaded, THEN open a new instance of the program with an empty, untitled address book.
        Specified by:
        onFileNew in interface GUICore

      • onFileOpen

        public void onFileOpen()
        Description copied from interface: GUICore
        Prompts user for file name FIRST, THEN IF it seems to be valid: IF an untitled, empty address book is loaded, reuse this window, ELSE start a new instance of the program and load it there. ALLOW the user to cancel.
        Specified by:
        onFileOpen in interface GUICore

      • openFile

        Parameters:
        file - an extant file to open

      • prepareEmptyBook

        public void prepareEmptyBook()
        Description copied from interface: GUICore
        If there is a loaded address book then unloads it. Creates a new VirtualAddressBook with default columns and no contacts.
        Specified by:
        prepareEmptyBook in interface GUICore

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

        Parameters:
        args - command line arguments: -n open an untitled, empty address book
